origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceRegulationAPI.evaluate_policy', 'description': 'This function evaluates the effectiveness of financial regulations, collects relevant documents, analyzes the influence on various financial entities, and assesses the regulatory impact on the financial sector.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policyType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of financial regulation policy, e.g., banking, securities, insurance.'}, {'name': 'collectDocuments', 'type': 'BOOLEAN', 'description': 'Whether to collect the latest policy documents.'}, {'name': 'analyzeInfluence', 'type': 'BOOLEAN', 'description': 'Whether to analyze the influence on different financial institutions.'}, {'name': 'regulatoryImpact', 'type': 'BOOLEAN', 'description': 'Whether to assess the impact of regulations on the financial sector.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'evaluationReport', 'description': 'A comprehensive report on the evaluation of the financial regulation policy.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceRegulationAPI.evaluate_policy, 它的参数输入如下: 'policyType'是'securities', 'collectDocuments'是'true', 'analyzeInfluence'是'true', 'regulatoryImpact'是'true'.
